targets.expr:
sum(
  (
    max by (compute_host, resource, availability_zone) (
      cortex_total_capacity_per_host{
        resource="cpu",
        availability_zone=~"$availability_zone",
        compute_host=~"$compute_host",
        hypervisor_family=~"$hypervisor_family",
        workload_type=~"$workload_type",
        cpu_architecture=~"$cpu_architecture",
        enabled=~"$enabled"
      }
    )
    *
    on(compute_host, resource, availability_zone)
    (
      1 - max by (compute_host, resource, availability_zone) (
        cortex_host_utilization_per_host_pct{
          resource="cpu",
          availability_zone=~"$availability_zone",
          compute_host=~"$compute_host",
          hypervisor_family=~"$hypervisor_family",
          enabled=~"$enabled",
          workload_type=~"$workload_type",
          cpu_architecture=~"$cpu_architecture",
          enabled=~"$enabled"
        } / 100
      )
    )
  )
)

predict_linear(
  sum(
  (
    max by (compute_host, resource, availability_zone) (
      cortex_total_capacity_per_host{
        resource="cpu",
        availability_zone=~"$availability_zone",
        compute_host=~"$compute_host",
        hypervisor_family=~"$hypervisor_family",
        workload_type=~"$workload_type",
        cpu_architecture=~"$cpu_architecture",
        enabled=~"$enabled"
      }
    )
    *
    on(compute_host, resource, availability_zone)
    (
      1 - max by (compute_host, resource, availability_zone) (
        cortex_host_utilization_per_host_pct{
          resource="cpu",
          availability_zone=~"$availability_zone",
          compute_host=~"$compute_host",
          hypervisor_family=~"$hypervisor_family",
          workload_type=~"$workload_type",
          cpu_architecture=~"$cpu_architecture",
          enabled=~"$enabled"
        } / 100
      )
    )
  )
)[1d:]
, 86400) /
